website_summaries.verdict: An inexpensive brace that pushes back your shoulders to remind you to stand and sit with good posture.
pros: Aligns the spine by pushing the shoulders back
Recommended for help with scoliosis, slouching, hunching, and "computer posture."
fits both men and women in chest, sizes 25 inches to 53 inches
cons: The straps are more prone to slipping than some other models

customer_reviews.title: False Promises

It cuts into one's armpits and after about an hour's wear, it begins to create a rash. Wearing it over a t-shirt or padding the armpit area, doesn't help. 4) I requested a refund and was denied. This product is not effective and can be harmful. I'm surprised that no one has brought a lawsuit against this company yet. The product is really that bad!

customer_reviews.author: lebbiee

customer_reviews.title: Not for active people.
customer_reviews.text: This product was easy to put on the first time, but once you take it off I found it gets tangled easily. I do a lot of walking, sitting, and lifting for work. I wanted to work on my posture while walking and sitting. However if you have to bend over, pick anything up, or hold your arms out in front of you it digs into your shoulders painfully. After I started loosing circulation in my arms I decided this wasn't the product for me. I checked the instructonal information it came with and that I received via email. Nothing helped. I wouldn't recommend this product unless you sit at a desk all day and need posture correction from slouching.
customer_reviews.author: Alexa

customer_reviews.title: I was skeptical
customer_reviews.text: I have had horrible posture since I was young. I wanted to change it, but all the wonky reviews on all the different posture correctors made me skeptical. Finally, I made the leap and bought this one. It has helped so much! It's super comfortable. I wore it for a few days, and when I took it off, my back would hurt because I was slouching and it had already changed how my back was used to being positioned. I still have to be conscious about my posture, but it has helped so much.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and comfortable!! Love this
customer_reviews.text: Love this item. I have very poor posture and this harness is already helping I can feel it. It took me about a month to decide which brand to get but I finally decided on this one randomly and I love it. It's also very easy to figure out how to use, and it's very comfortable. It's adjustable as well so you can tighten it to your liking. I'm normally a small in most things so I went with the small and it fits great after adjusted.
customer_reviews.author: A. M.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: Note: this review is by a 6'0" 170lbs Male. This posture corrector is definitely one of the best out there. It's comfortable, easy to adjust, and can be worn on top of an undershirt. I wouldn't say you can wear a tight fitting shirt over it, but it's great if you're going to be wearing a jacket or something loose.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick M.

customer_reviews.title: Far more comfortable than the last posture corrector I tried
customer_reviews.text: I have forward curvature of my shoulders from driving trucks for 35 years. Tried another brand of posture corrector, but couldn't even wear it for 10 minutes it was so uncomfortable. I wear a men's XL tee-shirt and this posture brace is far more comfortable. The extra padding on the straps take a little adjusting when I first put it on, but I really think it's helping. I notice less curve and improvement in my posture. I can breathe a little easier too. I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Mare

customer_reviews.title: It certainly does the job!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great idea. It works well. However, it is not very comfortable around the arms (where it goes underneath) and it's hard to wear for longer than an hour at a time. In addition, if you want to wear it under your clothes, it's not invisible. The top part sticks out. And of course, you would have to wear it over a t-shirt if you don't want it to cut into your arms. Having said all this, I work from home and I'm at a computer all day, so it is the perfect tool to make sure I sit up straight.
customer_reviews.author: Gingit Angel

customer_reviews.title: buckles on backward
customer_reviews.text: one of the for tightening/loosening the straps was attached backwards. why does it matter? the inverted position of the buckle means there is no tension in the 'belt' and any tightening adjustment is lost immediately. the buckle is sewn in several times over - really the assembly of the brace is quality given how much detail was spent on what parts needed to be reinforced and capable of withstanding a lot of pull. but the right side/wrong side of this small plastic part is subtle and should have been caught in quality control.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Still trying to figure out how to wear this thing. At first it seems very simple but it keeps riding up my neck and I have to pull it down. Now it did train my back and I wore it to work and noone could tell I had it on although I had a jacket on except for the times it kept ridding up my neck and had to pull it down. Otherwise, this product is very comfortable. I wore for 8hrs and then some as I got off work and ran errands still pulling it down from time to time. Easy to adjust straps and very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Corinth Williams

customer_reviews.title: Almost instant pain relief!
customer_reviews.text: I decided to try this after a doctor recommended I buy one since I could only do back/shoulder therapy two times a week. It was very easy to put on and does its job instantly. It provided almost immediate pain relief and is quite comfortable. I mainly use this when I'm sitting so I don't start slouching without realizing I'm doing it.
customer_reviews.author: Dane

customer_reviews.title: I already see and feel a difference after two days of use
customer_reviews.text: I had a friend recommend purchasing one after we talked about posture and she mentioned it helped her, so I ordered mine. Thus far I recommend it as well. I already see and feel a difference after two days of use....That, to me, is significant. I'm also sharing it with my housemate, which is great (since i don't need to wear it all the time, only enough time to retrain my muscles)!
customer_reviews.author: Bar-Iowana

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: I just started using it yesterday afternoon and already feeling some relief. Hoping it keeps working so that my back can fully heal. Update: used it for a week and a half and the excruciating upper back pain is now completely gone. I still use it when I’m at my desk at work to prevent the pain from returning. Added bonus if worn under a jacket or cardigan it gives great posture. I got so many compliments when I wore it and coworkers couldn’t pin point what it was (a haircut? New outfit?) so that’s great.
customer_reviews.author: Claugo

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I have another posture corrector from a different manufacturer/brand. This one seems way better. I haven’t used it yet, but I’m not expecting it fall apart anytime soon. One thing is, not that it matters much, but it did not come with the bag that shows up in the product pictures or some of the review pictures. So might be a new thing. That’s why the 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: lexy

customer_reviews.title: Sorry to say.
customer_reviews.text: FIRST REVIEW: Really just what I was looking for. Its as comfortable as something like this can be and does the job without simply without alot of hassle. SECONDARY Review After wearing for a month as needed it now is either too tight or it slides down which gives no help with my widows hump.... Wish I could find an effective brace...
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: extremely uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: It does hold you up straight, if you can handle the digging into your skin. Leave makes and not easy at all to get on or off. Would not reccomend
customer_reviews.author: ROBIN LEUTHARDT

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: I like that it’s comfortable enough that I can wear it for hours. It really does work to correct your posture; not because it keeps your back from curling but because it acts as a constant reminder to straighten out your back. If you really tried to ignore it, you could still curl your back, but for me, I found that all I really need is a constant reminder to straighten out my back and this posture corrector is exactly that.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Beyond uncomfortable and scratchy on the back of my neck. No way could this thing be worn underneath clothing without being visible. I’m very disappointed and don’t understand how this received so many positive reviews.
customer_reviews.author: cntrygrl023

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Just go these today and started wearing them. So far so good. They definitely provide support to keep you up straight without being uncomfortable. I'll update my review as we continue to wear. The support at the neck is really nice. I've been suffering with a lot of pain in my neck because of my poor posture. Where this sits on the base of your neck helps to keep your neck straight as well.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Gray

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable Velcro Hell
customer_reviews.text: Incredibly uncomfortable. I gave it my best, I wore it multiple times. We're in a Pandemic. Why shouldn't I work on my posture right? This was a constant uncomfortable velcro nightmare. I ended up putting a Post-It note on my monitor. Every time I see it I straighten up. It might take me 4x as long to fix my posture. But I won't be constantly uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Decent purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Overall I like this product. It’s fairly comfortable (once I figured out I put it on upside down the first time 🤣🙈). The only thing I don’t like is due to limited mobility, I have to have my husband help me put it on each time. It does correct my posture and relieves upper back pain for me. Decent purchase
customer_reviews.author: Ariana Preston

customer_reviews.title: Product works but should only be worn for a limited time to avoid irritation from overuse.
customer_reviews.text: Except for getting used to to the rather thin strings (which have their justification for being thin) the product does it’s job in the posture looks much better. Since you’re only supposed to use it limited time a day, make sure that you use it only for that time in order to not get skin irritation. Avoid wearing it In situations where you know you won’t be able to take it off such a business conferences or presentations. It would be nice if future versions of the product would be made out of softer material and or minimally stretching material in order to improve comfort
customer_reviews.author: Marc R.

customer_reviews.title: Helps remind me to sit up straight
customer_reviews.text: I work at a desk and also love to game on my home computer. I noticed my posture wasn't very good, and often had back pain (nothing crippling, but more annoying.) I wear it over my shirts, so nothing rubs against my skin, and I find it comfortable. I haven't put a jacket on over it, I take it off when I have to get up from the desk. As recommended, I started off with 20 minutes and worked my way up to a full 8 hour day. I notice that even without it, my posture is much better.
customer_reviews.author: ScretSquirrl

customer_reviews.title: So far ok
customer_reviews.text: I slouch a lot so this definitely helps me to sit up straighter at my desk. I’m getting married in March and I wanted better posture for that. Hoping this works. Not the most comfortable but I like that it’s adjustable. I definitely feel a difference when I use it consistently but it’s easy to revert back after a day or two with out it.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: this item is not a one size fits all and will do nothing for your posture. It only serves as a reminder your wearing something. If you suffer from back or neck pains this will do nothing for you. Waste of money, time and only serves to cause armpit discomfort.
customer_reviews.author: Ducky

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Used once. I know that “you actually have to mind you posture and use it as a support not think it’ll do the work for you” but it was uncomfortable on my pits, i’m slender and unfortunately breasts for years have made me slouch. It’s uncomfortable. It also hurts my trap muscles which is where I have the most pain anyways. It does not support anything, just hurts so by hurting you it makes you want to stand straight up. Did i mention it was uncomfortable?
customer_reviews.author: Hayley Paolera

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. I was having severe pain. I was going to physical therapy and the Dr. I bought this not thinking it would really work ( but it was inexpensive,so I thought for the price, I’ll give it a try). I stand up straighter and my cervical part of my spine appears to not be pressing on the nerves running down my arm.
customer_reviews.author: dbhelene

customer_reviews.title: Need to tighten more
customer_reviews.text: I am a 225 lb. person and I’ve slouched for 50 plus years, and I have to tighten it all the way before it makes me sit straight. If I wear it comfortable I slouch thru the uncomfortableness. Lol It does make me sit straight at full tightness so for a small lady I think you’d definitely need a smaller one. It needs to tighten more.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: It is worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: This posture corrector is worth the price. I liked that it helped me keep my shoulders back, yet it holds the shoulders quiet high. This can be an issue as you want your shoulders held lower, yet I am happy with how it works. The straps are not comfortable to wear on your skin, yet you hardly notice it when you have a shirt under it. You can wear it in public, yet men should have a sweater on since it looks like you are wearing a bra. It is not comfortable to sleep in, yet can be worn for most of the day before it gets annoying.
customer_reviews.author: user123

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: This product won't make you stand or sit up tall--but that's the point. The harness continually reminds you to get in proper alignment so that you slowly gain muscle strength and memory. You can definitely slouch while wearing it, but you'll feel it through the harness. I'm not there yet, but after a week I already "catch myself" sitting more properly when not wearing the device.
customer_reviews.author: mama bear

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I LITERALLY never write reviews on anything and am an avid Amazon customer. But i felt super compelled to let everyone know YES this product WORKS! I cannot race about it enough! I have had HORRIBLE posture my entire life. I slouch constantly. I'm a receptionist, have been a caregiver, and a server. If you've been in the field, you know it eventually takes a toll on your back! I received this product and got instant relief from the pain I feel from my horrible posture. I look and feel SO much better. Thank you SO much!
customer_reviews.author: Madison Eberhart

customer_reviews.title: Better posture and less pain
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to help support my back, it normally hurts because of my bad posture. However, since i started using this back support/brace i have been sitting up a little better and my back aches are reduced.
customer_reviews.author: nat

customer_reviews.title: Retraining our 10 year old’s slouch
customer_reviews.text: We’ve watched our 10 year old son’s posture get worse and worse. Recently a friend also noticed and mentioned that I look into getting a posture corrector for him. This one gets great reviews and we got it in the mail and tried it today! It was comfortable and easy to adjust. Looking forward to getting great results and retraining his muscles to hold his shoulders back and bring in his core from slouching. I’m thankful for something so easy to help refrain him!
customer_reviews.author: Yabanci

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done + immediate posture improvement
customer_reviews.text: I love that this product is easy to use and adjust. Once putting it on and adjusting to my size, I already started sitting straighter and stopped curving my back. After using this product for about two weeks consistently, it created a muscle memory for me so that I would know if was slouching when not wearing the straightener. Highly recommend if you want to train your body to have better posture! Very inexpensive purchase, but worth the investment.
customer_reviews.author: Katrina Torrijos

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my 14 year old son who is starting to hunch terribly. When it came, I tried it on and was surprised how simple it was to put on and pretty comfortable. Nothing was rubbing under my arms or causing discomfort. When my son got home from school, he tried it on and was able to keep it on longer than 20 minutes recommended to start with. It didn’t irritate him like I thought it could.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer dunn

customer_reviews.title: Instant Difference
customer_reviews.text: I have been experiencign back pain for several weeks now after sitting down for hours studying for the Florida Bar. I decided to give this product a try to see if my pain would go away. So far, it seems like its doing the job. Ten minutes after wearing it, the bones in back started to crack and the amount of pain was reduced.
customer_reviews.author: Leoni

customer_reviews.title: Light weight, comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This posture corrector is great. it help to align ur top back and make sure you are not slumped! It is also light weight and extremely comfortable to wear. Well obviously there will be a slight feel but it is next to nothing! Go for it if u need back adjustment and want to stand straight!
customer_reviews.author: Kai C

customer_reviews.title: Bad design
customer_reviews.text: This product sucked for me. With the help of my mom we tried many different adjustment on it, and still all that it did was cut the circulation off of my arms with in seconds. I was really looking forward to all the benifits it touted. I have an arthritic back and degenerative disc disease, to name a couple issues with my back, and am still looking for a posture corrector, because this one ain't it!
customer_reviews.author: Tuesday Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Works pretty well but not very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This is a little awkward to wear. I wouldn’t be able to wear it out and about but I do wear it occasionally at home. It doesn’t hold your posture correctly, but it does make it uncomfortable to slouch, so it works but I wouldn’t wear it a lot. It would definitely be noticeable under clothing.
customer_reviews.author: chellie heard
